rows.label: tlk00040104_msg0001
rows.name:
Punin-san... what are you
sneaking around for?

rows.label: tlk00040104_msg0003
rows.name:
Never mind Punin, go do your best with the
salvaging, mo! The Chairman has high hopes, mo.

rows.label: tlk00040104_msg0004
rows.name:
Of course I'll do my best.
I want that 100,000G reward, after all.

rows.label: tlk00040104_msg0005
rows.name:
That's the spirit, mo! Now, go down the
stairs and hurry to the meeting point, mo!
